                    }
                }
                if (endMarker) break;
            }

            if (startMarker && endMarker) {
                return {
                    startMarker,
                    endMarker,
                    startLine,
                    endLine,
                    content: lines.slice(startLine + 1, endLine).join('\n')
                };
            }

            return null;
        }

        function findMarkerInDocument(marker) {
            const pattern = markerPatterns[marker];
            for (let i = 0; i < documentLines.length; i++) {
                if (pattern.test(documentLines[i].trim())) {
                    return i;
                }
            }
            return -1;
        }

        function analyzeChanges() {
            const pastedText = pasteArea.value.trim();
            if (!pastedText || !loadedDocument) return;

            // Detect marker range in pasted section
            detectedRange = detectMarkerRange(pastedText);
            
            if (!detectedRange) {
                showMessage('❌ No valid marker range detected in pasted text', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Show detected range info
            document.getElementById('startMarker').textContent = detectedRange.startMarker;
            document.getElementById('endMarker').textContent = detectedRange.endMarker;
            document.getElementById('sectionInfo').textContent = 
                `Lines ${detectedRange.startLine + 1} to ${detectedRange.endLine + 1}`;
            markerInfo.style.display = 'block';

            // Find corresponding markers in loaded document
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);

            if (docStartLine === -1 || docEndLine === -1) {
                showMessage('❌ Could not find matching markers in loaded document', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Extract original section
            const originalContent = documentLines.slice(docStartLine + 1, docEndLine).join('\n');
            const newContent = detectedRange.content;

            // Perform diff
            changes = computeDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            
            // Display results
            displayDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            displayChanges();
            displayStats();
            
            diffContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            changesPanel.style.display = 'block';
            statsContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            
            showMessage('🎯 Analysis complete - Review changes below', 'success');
        }

        function computeDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalLines = original.split('\n');
            const newLines = newText.split('\n');
            const changes = [];

            // Simple line-by-line diff
            const maxLen = Math.max(originalLines.length, newLines.length);
            
            for (let i = 0; i < maxLen; i++) {
                const origLine = originalLines[i] || '';
                const newLine = newLines[i] || '';
                
                if (i >= originalLines.length) {
                    // Line added
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'add',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: '',
                        new: newLine
                    });
                } else if (i >= newLines.length) {
                    // Line removed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'remove',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: origLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: ''
                    });
                } else if (origLine !== newLine) {
                    // Line changed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'change',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: newLine
                    });
                }
            }

            return changes;
        }

        function displayDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalCode = document.getElementById('originalCode');
            const newCode = document.getElementById('newCode');
            
            originalCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(original.split('\n'), 'original');
            newCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(newText.split('\n'), 'new');
        }

        function highlightDiff(lines, type) {
            return lines.map((line, i) => {
                const change = changes.find(c => c.lineNum === i + 1);
                let cssClass = 'line-unchanged';
                
                if (change) {
                    if (type === 'original') {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-unchanged' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-removed' : 'line-removed';
                    } else {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-added' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-unchanged' : 'line-added';
                    }
                }
                
                return `<div class="diff-line ${cssClass}">${escapeHtml(line || ' ')}</div>`;
            }).join('');
        }

        function displayChanges() {
            const changesList = document.getElementById('changesList');
            
            changesList.innerHTML = changes.map((change, index) => `
                <div class="change-item" id="change-${index}">
                    <div class="change-info">
                        <div class="change-line">
                            <strong>${change.type.toUpperCase()}</strong> Line ${change.lineNum}
                        </div>
                        <div class="change-preview">
                            ${change.type === 'add' ? '+ ' : change.type === 'remove' ? '- ' : '~ '}
                            ${escapeHtml(change.content.slice(0, 80))}${change.content.length > 80 ? '...' : ''}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="change-actions">
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-apply" onclick="applyChange(${index})">
                            Apply
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-reject" onclick="rejectChange(${index})">
                            Skip
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');

            document.getElementById('applyAllBtn').onclick = applyAllChanges;
        }

        function displayStats() {
            const added = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'add').length;
            const removed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'remove').length;
            const changed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'change').length;
            
            document.getElementById('linesAdded').textContent = added;
            document.getElementById('linesRemoved').textContent = removed;
            document.getElementById('linesChanged').textContent = changed;
            document.getElementById('totalChanges').textContent = changes.length;
        }

        function applyChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as applied
            change.applied = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.5';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`✅ Applied change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'success');
        }

        function rejectChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as rejected
            change.rejected = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.3';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`❌ Skipped change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'error');
        }

        function applyAllChanges() {
            let appliedCount = 0;
            
            changes.forEach((change, index) => {
                if (!change.applied && !change.rejected) {
                    applyChange(index);
                    appliedCount++;
                }
            });
            
            if (appliedCount > 0) {
                showMessage(`🎉 Applied ${appliedCount} changes! Ready to save to ${fileName}`, 'success');
                
                // Here you would implement the actual file saving logic
                // For now, we'll just show the updated content
                generateUpdatedDocument();
            } else {
                showMessage('ℹ️ No new changes to apply', 'error');
            }
        }

        function generateUpdatedDocument() {
            if (!detectedRange) return;
            
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);
            
            // Apply changes to create updated document
            const appliedChanges = changes.filter(c => c.applied);
            let updatedSection = detectedRange.content;
            
            // Create updated document
            const updatedLines = [
                ...documentLines.slice(0, docStartLine + 1),
                ...updatedSection.split('\n'),
                ...documentLines.slice(docEndLine)
            ];
            
            const updatedDocument = updatedLines.join('\n');
            
            // Create download link
            const blob = new Blob([updatedDocument], { type: 'text/plain' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = url;
            a.download = fileName.replace(/\.([^.]+)$/, '-updated.$1');
            a.click();
            URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
        }

        function showMessage(message, type) {
            const className = type === 'success' ? 'success-message' : 'error-message';
            messageArea.innerHTML = `<div class="${className}">${message}</div>`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageArea.innerHTML = '';
            }, 5000);
        }

        function escapeHtml(text) {
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.textContent = text;
            return div.innerHTML;
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <div class="container">

Example:
#⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜ 3/8 MARKER ⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜#
your code here...
#½½½½½½ 1/2 MARKER ½½½½½#"></textarea>

            <p><strong>Section:</strong> <span id="sectionInfo"></span></p>
        </div>

            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesAdded">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Added</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesRemoved">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Removed</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesChanged">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Changed</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="totalChanges">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Total Changes</div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="diff-container" id="diffContainer" style="display: none;">
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>📄 Original (Loaded File)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="originalCode"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>✨ New (Pasted Section)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="newCode"></div>
            </div>

        </div>

    <script>
        // Global state
        let loadedDocument = '';
        let documentLines = [];
        let pastedSection = '';
        let detectedRange = null;
        let changes = [];
        let fileName = '';

        // DOM elements
        const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
        const loadBtn = document.getElementById('loadBtn');
        const pasteArea = document.getElementById('pasteArea');
        const analyzeBtn = document.getElementById('analyzeBtn');
        const markerInfo = document.getElementById('markerInfo');
        const diffContainer = document.getElementById('diffContainer');
        const changesPanel = document.getElementById('changesPanel');
        const statsContainer = document.getElementById('statsContainer');
        const messageArea = document.getElementById('messageArea');

        // Marker patterns - supporting fractions from 1/8 to 7/8
        const markerPatterns = {
            '1/8': /^#⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛ 1\/8 MARKER ⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛#/,
            '1/4': /^#¼¼¼¼¼¼ 1\/4 MARKER ¼¼¼¼¼#/,
            '3/8': /^#⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜ 3\/8 MARKER ⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜#/,
            '1/2': /^#½½½½½½ 1\/2 MARKER ½½½½½#/,
            '5/8': /^#⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝ 5\/8 MARKER ⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝#/,
            '3/4': /^#¾¾¾¾¾¾ 3\/4 MARKER ¾¾¾¾¾#/,
            '7/8': /^#⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞ 7\/8 MARKER ⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞#/
        };

        // Event listeners
        fileInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
            loadBtn.disabled = !this.files.length;
        });

        loadBtn.addEventListener('click', loadDocument);
        analyzeBtn.addEventListener('click', analyzeChanges);
        pasteArea.addEventListener('input', function() {
            analyzeBtn.disabled = !this.value.trim() || !loadedDocument;
        });

        function loadDocument() {
            const file = fileInput.files[0];
            if (!file) return;

            fileName = file.name;
            const reader = new FileReader();
            
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                loadedDocument = e.target.result;
                documentLines = loadedDocument.split('\n');
                showMessage(`✅ Loaded "${fileName}" - ${documentLines.length} lines`, 'success');
                analyzeBtn.disabled = !pasteArea.value.trim();
            };
            
            reader.readAsText(file);
        }

        function detectMarkerRange(text) {
            const lines = text.trim().split('\n');
            let startMarker = null;
            let endMarker = null;
            let startLine = -1;
            let endLine = -1;

            // Find start marker
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                for (const [fraction, pattern] of Object.entries(markerPatterns)) {
                    if (pattern.test(lines[i].trim())) {
                        if (!startMarker) {
                            startMarker = fraction;
                            startLine = i;
                        } else {
                            endMarker = fraction;
                            endLine = i;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (endMarker) break;
            }

            if (startMarker && endMarker) {
                return {
                    startMarker,
                    endMarker,
                    startLine,
                    endLine,
                    content: lines.slice(startLine + 1, endLine).join('\n')
                };
            }

            return null;
        }

        function findMarkerInDocument(marker) {
            const pattern = markerPatterns[marker];
            for (let i = 0; i < documentLines.length; i++) {
                if (pattern.test(documentLines[i].trim())) {
                    return i;
                }
            }
            return -1;
        }

        function analyzeChanges() {
            const pastedText = pasteArea.value.trim();
            if (!pastedText || !loadedDocument) return;

            // Detect marker range in pasted section
            detectedRange = detectMarkerRange(pastedText);
            
            if (!detectedRange) {
                showMessage('❌ No valid marker range detected in pasted text', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Show detected range info
            document.getElementById('startMarker').textContent = detectedRange.startMarker;
            document.getElementById('endMarker').textContent = detectedRange.endMarker;
            document.getElementById('sectionInfo').textContent = 
                `Lines ${detectedRange.startLine + 1} to ${detectedRange.endLine + 1}`;
            markerInfo.style.display = 'block';

            // Find corresponding markers in loaded document
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);

            if (docStartLine === -1 || docEndLine === -1) {
                showMessage('❌ Could not find matching markers in loaded document', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Extract original section
            const originalContent = documentLines.slice(docStartLine + 1, docEndLine).join('\n');
            const newContent = detectedRange.content;

            // Perform diff
            changes = computeDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            
            // Display results
            displayDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            displayChanges();
            displayStats();
            
            diffContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            changesPanel.style.display = 'block';
            statsContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            
            showMessage('🎯 Analysis complete - Review changes below', 'success');
        }

        function computeDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalLines = original.split('\n');
            const newLines = newText.split('\n');
            const changes = [];

            // Simple line-by-line diff
            const maxLen = Math.max(originalLines.length, newLines.length);
            
            for (let i = 0; i < maxLen; i++) {
                const origLine = originalLines[i] || '';
                const newLine = newLines[i] || '';
                
                if (i >= originalLines.length) {
                    // Line added
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'add',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: '',
                        new: newLine
                    });
                } else if (i >= newLines.length) {
                    // Line removed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'remove',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: origLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: ''
                    });
                } else if (origLine !== newLine) {
                    // Line changed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'change',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: newLine
                    });
                }
            }

            return changes;
        }

        function displayDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalCode = document.getElementById('originalCode');
            const newCode = document.getElementById('newCode');
            
            originalCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(original.split('\n'), 'original');
            newCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(newText.split('\n'), 'new');
        }

        function highlightDiff(lines, type) {
            return lines.map((line, i) => {
                const change = changes.find(c => c.lineNum === i + 1);
                let cssClass = 'line-unchanged';
                
                if (change) {
                    if (type === 'original') {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-unchanged' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-removed' : 'line-removed';
                    } else {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-added' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-unchanged' : 'line-added';
                    }
                }
                
                return `<div class="diff-line ${cssClass}">${escapeHtml(line || ' ')}</div>`;
            }).join('');
        }

        function displayChanges() {
            const changesList = document.getElementById('changesList');
            
            changesList.innerHTML = changes.map((change, index) => `
                <div class="change-item" id="change-${index}">
                    <div class="change-info">
                        <div class="change-line">
                            <strong>${change.type.toUpperCase()}</strong> Line ${change.lineNum}
                        </div>
                        <div class="change-preview">
                            ${change.type === 'add' ? '+ ' : change.type === 'remove' ? '- ' : '~ '}
                            ${escapeHtml(change.content.slice(0, 80))}${change.content.length > 80 ? '...' : ''}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="change-actions">
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-apply" onclick="applyChange(${index})">
                            Apply
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-reject" onclick="rejectChange(${index})">
                            Skip
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');

            document.getElementById('applyAllBtn').onclick = applyAllChanges;
        }

        function displayStats() {
            const added = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'add').length;
            const removed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'remove').length;
            const changed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'change').length;
            
            document.getElementById('linesAdded').textContent = added;
            document.getElementById('linesRemoved').textContent = removed;
            document.getElementById('linesChanged').textContent = changed;
            document.getElementById('totalChanges').textContent = changes.length;
        }

        function applyChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as applied
            change.applied = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.5';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`✅ Applied change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'success');
        }

        function rejectChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as rejected
            change.rejected = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.3';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`❌ Skipped change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'error');
        }

        function applyAllChanges() {
            let appliedCount = 0;
            
            changes.forEach((change, index) => {
                if (!change.applied && !change.rejected) {
                    applyChange(index);
                    appliedCount++;
                }
            });
            
            if (appliedCount > 0) {
                showMessage(`🎉 Applied ${appliedCount} changes! Ready to save to ${fileName}`, 'success');
                
                // Here you would implement the actual file saving logic
                // For now, we'll just show the updated content
                generateUpdatedDocument();
            } else {
                showMessage('ℹ️ No new changes to apply', 'error');
            }
        }

        function generateUpdatedDocument() {
            if (!detectedRange) return;
            
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);
            
            // Apply changes to create updated document
            const appliedChanges = changes.filter(c => c.applied);
            let updatedSection = detectedRange.content;
            
            // Create updated document
            const updatedLines = [
                ...documentLines.slice(0, docStartLine + 1),
                ...updatedSection.split('\n'),
                ...documentLines.slice(docEndLine)
            ];
            
            const updatedDocument = updatedLines.join('\n');
            
            // Create download link
            const blob = new Blob([updatedDocument], { type: 'text/plain' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = url;
            a.download = fileName.replace(/\.([^.]+)$/, '-updated.$1');
            a.click();
            URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
        }

        function showMessage(message, type) {
            const className = type === 'success' ? 'success-message' : 'error-message';
            messageArea.innerHTML = `<div class="${className}">${message}</div>`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageArea.innerHTML = '';
            }, 5000);
        }

        function escapeHtml(text) {
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.textContent = text;
            return div.innerHTML;
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<body>
    <div class="container">
        <div class="header">
            🔧 MARKER DIFF MANAGER 🔧
        </div>

        <div class="controls">
            <div class="file-section">
                <div class="section-title">
                    <span class="icon">📁</span>
                    Load Marked Document
                </div>
                <input type="file" id="fileInput" accept=".py,.js,.txt,.md" />
                <button class="btn" id="loadBtn" disabled>Load Document</button>
            </div>

            <div class="file-section">
                <div class="section-title">
                    <span class="icon">📋</span>
                    Paste Code Section
                </div>
                <textarea class="paste-area scrollbar" id="pasteArea" placeholder="Paste your marked code section here...

Example:
#⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜ 3/8 MARKER ⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜#
your code here...
#½½½½½½ 1/2 MARKER ½½½½½#"></textarea>
                <button class="btn" id="analyzeBtn" disabled>Analyze Changes</button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div id="markerInfo" class="marker-info" style="display: none;">
            <h3>🎯 Detected Marker Range</h3>
            <p><strong>From:</strong> <span class="marker-pattern" id="startMarker"></span></p>
            <p><strong>To:</strong> <span class="marker-pattern" id="endMarker"></span></p>
            <p><strong>Section:</strong> <span id="sectionInfo"></span></p>
        </div>

        <div class="stats" id="statsContainer" style="display: none;">
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesAdded">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Added</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesRemoved">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Removed</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesChanged">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Changed</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="totalChanges">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Total Changes</div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="diff-container" id="diffContainer" style="display: none;">
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>📄 Original (Loaded File)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="originalCode"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>✨ New (Pasted Section)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="newCode"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="changes-panel" id="changesPanel" style="display: none;">
            <h3>⚡ Individual Changes</h3>
            <div id="changesList"></div>
            <button class="btn btn-apply-all" id="applyAllBtn">Apply All Changes</button>
        </div>

        <div id="messageArea"></div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Global state
        let loadedDocument = '';
        let documentLines = [];
        let pastedSection = '';
        let detectedRange = null;
        let changes = [];
        let fileName = '';

        // DOM elements
        const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
        const loadBtn = document.getElementById('loadBtn');
        const pasteArea = document.getElementById('pasteArea');
        const analyzeBtn = document.getElementById('analyzeBtn');
        const markerInfo = document.getElementById('markerInfo');
        const diffContainer = document.getElementById('diffContainer');
        const changesPanel = document.getElementById('changesPanel');
        const statsContainer = document.getElementById('statsContainer');
        const messageArea = document.getElementById('messageArea');

        // Marker patterns - supporting fractions from 1/8 to 7/8
        const markerPatterns = {
            '1/8': /^#⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛ 1\/8 MARKER ⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛#/,
            '1/4': /^#¼¼¼¼¼¼ 1\/4 MARKER ¼¼¼¼¼#/,
            '3/8': /^#⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜ 3\/8 MARKER ⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜#/,
            '1/2': /^#½½½½½½ 1\/2 MARKER ½½½½½#/,
            '5/8': /^#⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝ 5\/8 MARKER ⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝#/,
            '3/4': /^#¾¾¾¾¾¾ 3\/4 MARKER ¾¾¾¾¾#/,
            '7/8': /^#⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞ 7\/8 MARKER ⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞#/
        };

        // Event listeners
        fileInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
            loadBtn.disabled = !this.files.length;
        });

        loadBtn.addEventListener('click', loadDocument);
        analyzeBtn.addEventListener('click', analyzeChanges);
        pasteArea.addEventListener('input', function() {
            analyzeBtn.disabled = !this.value.trim() || !loadedDocument;
        });

        function loadDocument() {
            const file = fileInput.files[0];
            if (!file) return;

            fileName = file.name;
            const reader = new FileReader();
            
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                loadedDocument = e.target.result;
                documentLines = loadedDocument.split('\n');
                showMessage(`✅ Loaded "${fileName}" - ${documentLines.length} lines`, 'success');
                analyzeBtn.disabled = !pasteArea.value.trim();
            };
            
            reader.readAsText(file);
        }

        function detectMarkerRange(text) {
            const lines = text.trim().split('\n');
            let startMarker = null;
            let endMarker = null;
            let startLine = -1;
            let endLine = -1;

            // Find start marker
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                for (const [fraction, pattern] of Object.entries(markerPatterns)) {
                    if (pattern.test(lines[i].trim())) {
                        if (!startMarker) {
                            startMarker = fraction;
                            startLine = i;
                        } else {
                            endMarker = fraction;
                            endLine = i;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (endMarker) break;
            }

            if (startMarker && endMarker) {
                return {
                    startMarker,
                    endMarker,
                    startLine,
                    endLine,
                    content: lines.slice(startLine + 1, endLine).join('\n')
                };
            }

            return null;
        }

        function findMarkerInDocument(marker) {
            const pattern = markerPatterns[marker];
            for (let i = 0; i < documentLines.length; i++) {
                if (pattern.test(documentLines[i].trim())) {
                    return i;
                }
            }
            return -1;
        }

        function analyzeChanges() {
            const pastedText = pasteArea.value.trim();
            if (!pastedText || !loadedDocument) return;

            // Detect marker range in pasted section
            detectedRange = detectMarkerRange(pastedText);
            
            if (!detectedRange) {
                showMessage('❌ No valid marker range detected in pasted text', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Show detected range info
            document.getElementById('startMarker').textContent = detectedRange.startMarker;
            document.getElementById('endMarker').textContent = detectedRange.endMarker;
            document.getElementById('sectionInfo').textContent = 
                `Lines ${detectedRange.startLine + 1} to ${detectedRange.endLine + 1}`;
            markerInfo.style.display = 'block';

            // Find corresponding markers in loaded document
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);

            if (docStartLine === -1 || docEndLine === -1) {
                showMessage('❌ Could not find matching markers in loaded document', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Extract original section
            const originalContent = documentLines.slice(docStartLine + 1, docEndLine).join('\n');
            const newContent = detectedRange.content;

            // Perform diff
            changes = computeDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            
            // Display results
            displayDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            displayChanges();
            displayStats();
            
            diffContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            changesPanel.style.display = 'block';
            statsContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            
            showMessage('🎯 Analysis complete - Review changes below', 'success');
        }

        function computeDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalLines = original.split('\n');
            const newLines = newText.split('\n');
            const changes = [];

            // Simple line-by-line diff
            const maxLen = Math.max(originalLines.length, newLines.length);
            
            for (let i = 0; i < maxLen; i++) {
                const origLine = originalLines[i] || '';
                const newLine = newLines[i] || '';
                
                if (i >= originalLines.length) {
                    // Line added
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'add',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: '',
                        new: newLine
                    });
                } else if (i >= newLines.length) {
                    // Line removed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'remove',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: origLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: ''
                    });
                } else if (origLine !== newLine) {
                    // Line changed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'change',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: newLine
                    });
                }
            }

            return changes;
        }

        function displayDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalCode = document.getElementById('originalCode');
            const newCode = document.getElementById('newCode');
            
            originalCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(original.split('\n'), 'original');
            newCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(newText.split('\n'), 'new');
        }

        function highlightDiff(lines, type) {
            return lines.map((line, i) => {
                const change = changes.find(c => c.lineNum === i + 1);
                let cssClass = 'line-unchanged';
                
                if (change) {
                    if (type === 'original') {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-unchanged' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-removed' : 'line-removed';
                    } else {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-added' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-unchanged' : 'line-added';
                    }
                }
                
                return `<div class="diff-line ${cssClass}">${escapeHtml(line || ' ')}</div>`;
            }).join('');
        }

        function displayChanges() {
            const changesList = document.getElementById('changesList');
            
            changesList.innerHTML = changes.map((change, index) => `
                <div class="change-item" id="change-${index}">
                    <div class="change-info">
                        <div class="change-line">
                            <strong>${change.type.toUpperCase()}</strong> Line ${change.lineNum}
                        </div>
                        <div class="change-preview">
                            ${change.type === 'add' ? '+ ' : change.type === 'remove' ? '- ' : '~ '}
                            ${escapeHtml(change.content.slice(0, 80))}${change.content.length > 80 ? '...' : ''}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="change-actions">
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-apply" onclick="applyChange(${index})">
                            Apply
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-reject" onclick="rejectChange(${index})">
                            Skip
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');

            document.getElementById('applyAllBtn').onclick = applyAllChanges;
        }

        function displayStats() {
            const added = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'add').length;
            const removed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'remove').length;
            const changed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'change').length;
            
            document.getElementById('linesAdded').textContent = added;
            document.getElementById('linesRemoved').textContent = removed;
            document.getElementById('linesChanged').textContent = changed;
            document.getElementById('totalChanges').textContent = changes.length;
        }

        function applyChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as applied
            change.applied = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.5';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`✅ Applied change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'success');
        }

        function rejectChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as rejected
            change.rejected = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.3';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`❌ Skipped change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'error');
        }

        function applyAllChanges() {
            let appliedCount = 0;
            
            changes.forEach((change, index) => {
                if (!change.applied && !change.rejected) {
                    applyChange(index);
                    appliedCount++;
                }
            });
            
            if (appliedCount > 0) {
                showMessage(`🎉 Applied ${appliedCount} changes! Ready to save to ${fileName}`, 'success');
                
                // Here you would implement the actual file saving logic
                // For now, we'll just show the updated content
                generateUpdatedDocument();
            } else {
                showMessage('ℹ️ No new changes to apply', 'error');
            }
        }

        function generateUpdatedDocument() {
            if (!detectedRange) return;
            
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);
            
            // Apply changes to create updated document
            const appliedChanges = changes.filter(c => c.applied);
            let updatedSection = detectedRange.content;
            
            // Create updated document
            const updatedLines = [
                ...documentLines.slice(0, docStartLine + 1),
                ...updatedSection.split('\n'),
                ...documentLines.slice(docEndLine)
            ];
            
            const updatedDocument = updatedLines.join('\n');
            
            // Create download link
            const blob = new Blob([updatedDocument], { type: 'text/plain' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = url;
            a.download = fileName.replace(/\.([^.]+)$/, '-updated.$1');
            a.click();
            URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
        }

        function showMessage(message, type) {
            const className = type === 'success' ? 'success-message' : 'error-message';
            messageArea.innerHTML = `<div class="${className}">${message}</div>`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageArea.innerHTML = '';
            }, 5000);
        }

        function escapeHtml(text) {
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.textContent = text;
            return div.innerHTML;
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>

    <div class="container">

Example:

your code here...
#½½½½½½ 1/2 MARKER ½½½½½#"></textarea>

            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesRemoved">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Removed</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesChanged">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Lines Changed</div>
            </div>
            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="totalChanges">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Total Changes</div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="diff-container" id="diffContainer" style="display: none;">
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>📄 Original (Loaded File)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="originalCode"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>✨ New (Pasted Section)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="newCode"></div>
            </div>

            <div id="changesList"></div>

        </div>

    <script>
        // Global state
        let loadedDocument = '';
        let documentLines = [];
        let pastedSection = '';
        let detectedRange = null;
        let changes = [];
        let fileName = '';

        // DOM elements
        const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
        const loadBtn = document.getElementById('loadBtn');
        const pasteArea = document.getElementById('pasteArea');
        const analyzeBtn = document.getElementById('analyzeBtn');
        const markerInfo = document.getElementById('markerInfo');
        const diffContainer = document.getElementById('diffContainer');
        const changesPanel = document.getElementById('changesPanel');
        const statsContainer = document.getElementById('statsContainer');
        const messageArea = document.getElementById('messageArea');

        // Marker patterns - supporting fractions from 1/8 to 7/8
        const markerPatterns = {
            '1/8': /^#⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛ 1\/8 MARKER ⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛#/,
            '1/4': /^#¼¼¼¼¼¼ 1\/4 MARKER ¼¼¼¼¼#/,
            '3/8': /^#⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜ 3\/8 MARKER ⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜#/,
            '1/2': /^#½½½½½½ 1\/2 MARKER ½½½½½#/,
            '5/8': /^#⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝ 5\/8 MARKER ⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝#/,
            '3/4': /^#¾¾¾¾¾¾ 3\/4 MARKER ¾¾¾¾¾#/,
            '7/8': /^#⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞ 7\/8 MARKER ⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞#/
        };

        // Event listeners
        fileInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
            loadBtn.disabled = !this.files.length;
        });

        loadBtn.addEventListener('click', loadDocument);
        analyzeBtn.addEventListener('click', analyzeChanges);
        pasteArea.addEventListener('input', function() {
            analyzeBtn.disabled = !this.value.trim() || !loadedDocument;
        });

        function loadDocument() {
            const file = fileInput.files[0];
            if (!file) return;

            fileName = file.name;
            const reader = new FileReader();
            
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                loadedDocument = e.target.result;
                documentLines = loadedDocument.split('\n');
                showMessage(`✅ Loaded "${fileName}" - ${documentLines.length} lines`, 'success');
                analyzeBtn.disabled = !pasteArea.value.trim();
            };
            
            reader.readAsText(file);
        }

        function detectMarkerRange(text) {
            const lines = text.trim().split('\n');
            let startMarker = null;
            let endMarker = null;
            let startLine = -1;
            let endLine = -1;

            // Find start marker
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                for (const [fraction, pattern] of Object.entries(markerPatterns)) {
                    if (pattern.test(lines[i].trim())) {
                        if (!startMarker) {
                            startMarker = fraction;
                            startLine = i;
                        } else {
                            endMarker = fraction;
                            endLine = i;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (endMarker) break;
            }

            if (startMarker && endMarker) {
                return {
                    startMarker,
                    endMarker,
                    startLine,
                    endLine,
                    content: lines.slice(startLine + 1, endLine).join('\n')
                };
            }

            return null;
        }

        function findMarkerInDocument(marker) {
            const pattern = markerPatterns[marker];
            for (let i = 0; i < documentLines.length; i++) {
                if (pattern.test(documentLines[i].trim())) {
                    return i;
                }
            }
            return -1;
        }

        function analyzeChanges() {
            const pastedText = pasteArea.value.trim();
            if (!pastedText || !loadedDocument) return;

            // Detect marker range in pasted section
            detectedRange = detectMarkerRange(pastedText);
            
            if (!detectedRange) {
                showMessage('❌ No valid marker range detected in pasted text', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Show detected range info
            document.getElementById('startMarker').textContent = detectedRange.startMarker;
            document.getElementById('endMarker').textContent = detectedRange.endMarker;
            document.getElementById('sectionInfo').textContent = 
                `Lines ${detectedRange.startLine + 1} to ${detectedRange.endLine + 1}`;
            markerInfo.style.display = 'block';

            // Find corresponding markers in loaded document
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);

            if (docStartLine === -1 || docEndLine === -1) {
                showMessage('❌ Could not find matching markers in loaded document', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Extract original section
            const originalContent = documentLines.slice(docStartLine + 1, docEndLine).join('\n');
            const newContent = detectedRange.content;

            // Perform diff
            changes = computeDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            
            // Display results
            displayDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            displayChanges();
            displayStats();
            
            diffContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            changesPanel.style.display = 'block';
            statsContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            
            showMessage('🎯 Analysis complete - Review changes below', 'success');
        }

        function computeDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalLines = original.split('\n');
            const newLines = newText.split('\n');
            const changes = [];

            // Simple line-by-line diff
            const maxLen = Math.max(originalLines.length, newLines.length);
            
            for (let i = 0; i < maxLen; i++) {
                const origLine = originalLines[i] || '';
                const newLine = newLines[i] || '';
                
                if (i >= originalLines.length) {
                    // Line added
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'add',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: '',
                        new: newLine
                    });
                } else if (i >= newLines.length) {
                    // Line removed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'remove',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: origLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: ''
                    });
                } else if (origLine !== newLine) {
                    // Line changed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'change',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: newLine
                    });
                }
            }

            return changes;
        }

        function displayDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalCode = document.getElementById('originalCode');
            const newCode = document.getElementById('newCode');
            
            originalCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(original.split('\n'), 'original');
            newCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(newText.split('\n'), 'new');
        }

        function highlightDiff(lines, type) {
            return lines.map((line, i) => {
                const change = changes.find(c => c.lineNum === i + 1);
                let cssClass = 'line-unchanged';
                
                if (change) {
                    if (type === 'original') {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-unchanged' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-removed' : 'line-removed';
                    } else {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-added' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-unchanged' : 'line-added';
                    }
                }
                
                return `<div class="diff-line ${cssClass}">${escapeHtml(line || ' ')}</div>`;
            }).join('');
        }

        function displayChanges() {
            const changesList = document.getElementById('changesList');
            
            changesList.innerHTML = changes.map((change, index) => `
                <div class="change-item" id="change-${index}">
                    <div class="change-info">
                        <div class="change-line">
                            <strong>${change.type.toUpperCase()}</strong> Line ${change.lineNum}
                        </div>
                        <div class="change-preview">
                            ${change.type === 'add' ? '+ ' : change.type === 'remove' ? '- ' : '~ '}
                            ${escapeHtml(change.content.slice(0, 80))}${change.content.length > 80 ? '...' : ''}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="change-actions">
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-apply" onclick="applyChange(${index})">
                            Apply
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-reject" onclick="rejectChange(${index})">
                            Skip
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');

            document.getElementById('applyAllBtn').onclick = applyAllChanges;
        }

        function displayStats() {
            const added = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'add').length;
            const removed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'remove').length;
            const changed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'change').length;
            
            document.getElementById('linesAdded').textContent = added;
            document.getElementById('linesRemoved').textContent = removed;
            document.getElementById('linesChanged').textContent = changed;
            document.getElementById('totalChanges').textContent = changes.length;
        }

        function applyChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as applied
            change.applied = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.5';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`✅ Applied change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'success');
        }

        function rejectChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as rejected
            change.rejected = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.3';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`❌ Skipped change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'error');
        }

        function applyAllChanges() {
            let appliedCount = 0;
            
            changes.forEach((change, index) => {
                if (!change.applied && !change.rejected) {
                    applyChange(index);
                    appliedCount++;
                }
            });
            
            if (appliedCount > 0) {
                showMessage(`🎉 Applied ${appliedCount} changes! Ready to save to ${fileName}`, 'success');
                
                // Here you would implement the actual file saving logic
                // For now, we'll just show the updated content
                generateUpdatedDocument();
            } else {
                showMessage('ℹ️ No new changes to apply', 'error');
            }
        }

        function generateUpdatedDocument() {
            if (!detectedRange) return;
            
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);
            
            // Apply changes to create updated document
            const appliedChanges = changes.filter(c => c.applied);
            let updatedSection = detectedRange.content;
            
            // Create updated document
            const updatedLines = [
                ...documentLines.slice(0, docStartLine + 1),
                ...updatedSection.split('\n'),
                ...documentLines.slice(docEndLine)
            ];
            
            const updatedDocument = updatedLines.join('\n');
            
            // Create download link
            const blob = new Blob([updatedDocument], { type: 'text/plain' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = url;
            a.download = fileName.replace(/\.([^.]+)$/, '-updated.$1');

        }

        function showMessage(message, type) {

            messageArea.innerHTML = `<div class="${className}">${message}</div>`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageArea.innerHTML = '';
            }, 5000);
        }

        function escapeHtml(text) {
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.textContent = text;
            return div.innerHTML;
        }
    </script>
</body>

            <div class="file-section">

Example:

your code here...

            <p><strong>Section:</strong> <span id="sectionInfo"></span></p>
        </div>

            <div class="stat-card">
                <div class="stat-number" id="linesAdded">0</div>

            <div class="stat-card">

                <div class="stat-label">Lines Changed</div>

                <div class="stat-number" id="totalChanges">0</div>
                <div class="stat-label">Total Changes</div>
            </div>

        <div class="diff-container" id="diffContainer" style="display: none;">
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>📄 Original (Loaded File)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="originalCode"></div>
            </div>
            <div class="diff-panel">
                <h3>✨ New (Pasted Section)</h3>
                <div class="code-block scrollbar" id="newCode"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

            <div id="changesList"></div>
            <button class="btn btn-apply-all" id="applyAllBtn">Apply All Changes</button>
        </div>

        <div id="messageArea"></div>
    </div>

    <script>
        // Global state
        let loadedDocument = '';
        let documentLines = [];
        let pastedSection = '';
        let detectedRange = null;
        let changes = [];
        let fileName = '';

        // DOM elements
        const fileInput = document.getElementById('fileInput');
        const loadBtn = document.getElementById('loadBtn');
        const pasteArea = document.getElementById('pasteArea');
        const analyzeBtn = document.getElementById('analyzeBtn');
        const markerInfo = document.getElementById('markerInfo');
        const diffContainer = document.getElementById('diffContainer');
        const changesPanel = document.getElementById('changesPanel');
        const statsContainer = document.getElementById('statsContainer');
        const messageArea = document.getElementById('messageArea');

        // Marker patterns - supporting fractions from 1/8 to 7/8
        const markerPatterns = {
            '1/8': /^#⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛ 1\/8 MARKER ⅛⅛⅛⅛⅛#/,
            '1/4': /^#¼¼¼¼¼¼ 1\/4 MARKER ¼¼¼¼¼#/,
            '3/8': /^#⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜ 3\/8 MARKER ⅜⅜⅜⅜⅜#/,
            '1/2': /^#½½½½½½ 1\/2 MARKER ½½½½½#/,
            '5/8': /^#⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝ 5\/8 MARKER ⅝⅝⅝⅝⅝#/,
            '3/4': /^#¾¾¾¾¾¾ 3\/4 MARKER ¾¾¾¾¾#/,
            '7/8': /^#⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞ 7\/8 MARKER ⅞⅞⅞⅞⅞#/
        };

        // Event listeners
        fileInput.addEventListener('change', function() {
            loadBtn.disabled = !this.files.length;
        });

        loadBtn.addEventListener('click', loadDocument);
        analyzeBtn.addEventListener('click', analyzeChanges);
        pasteArea.addEventListener('input', function() {
            analyzeBtn.disabled = !this.value.trim() || !loadedDocument;
        });

        function loadDocument() {
            const file = fileInput.files[0];
            if (!file) return;

            fileName = file.name;
            const reader = new FileReader();
            
            reader.onload = function(e) {
                loadedDocument = e.target.result;
                documentLines = loadedDocument.split('\n');
                showMessage(`✅ Loaded "${fileName}" - ${documentLines.length} lines`, 'success');
                analyzeBtn.disabled = !pasteArea.value.trim();
            };
            
            reader.readAsText(file);
        }

        function detectMarkerRange(text) {
            const lines = text.trim().split('\n');
            let startMarker = null;
            let endMarker = null;
            let startLine = -1;
            let endLine = -1;

            // Find start marker
            for (let i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
                for (const [fraction, pattern] of Object.entries(markerPatterns)) {
                    if (pattern.test(lines[i].trim())) {
                        if (!startMarker) {
                            startMarker = fraction;
                            startLine = i;
                        } else {
                            endMarker = fraction;
                            endLine = i;
                            break;
                        }
                    }
                }
                if (endMarker) break;
            }

            if (startMarker && endMarker) {
                return {
                    startMarker,
                    endMarker,
                    startLine,
                    endLine,
                    content: lines.slice(startLine + 1, endLine).join('\n')
                };
            }

            return null;
        }

        function findMarkerInDocument(marker) {
            const pattern = markerPatterns[marker];
            for (let i = 0; i < documentLines.length; i++) {
                if (pattern.test(documentLines[i].trim())) {
                    return i;
                }
            }
            return -1;
        }

        function analyzeChanges() {
            const pastedText = pasteArea.value.trim();
            if (!pastedText || !loadedDocument) return;

            // Detect marker range in pasted section
            detectedRange = detectMarkerRange(pastedText);
            
            if (!detectedRange) {
                showMessage('❌ No valid marker range detected in pasted text', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Show detected range info
            document.getElementById('startMarker').textContent = detectedRange.startMarker;
            document.getElementById('endMarker').textContent = detectedRange.endMarker;
            document.getElementById('sectionInfo').textContent = 
                `Lines ${detectedRange.startLine + 1} to ${detectedRange.endLine + 1}`;
            markerInfo.style.display = 'block';

            // Find corresponding markers in loaded document
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);

            if (docStartLine === -1 || docEndLine === -1) {
                showMessage('❌ Could not find matching markers in loaded document', 'error');
                return;
            }

            // Extract original section
            const originalContent = documentLines.slice(docStartLine + 1, docEndLine).join('\n');
            const newContent = detectedRange.content;

            // Perform diff
            changes = computeDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            
            // Display results
            displayDiff(originalContent, newContent);
            displayChanges();
            displayStats();
            
            diffContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            changesPanel.style.display = 'block';
            statsContainer.style.display = 'grid';
            
            showMessage('🎯 Analysis complete - Review changes below', 'success');
        }

        function computeDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalLines = original.split('\n');
            const newLines = newText.split('\n');
            const changes = [];

            // Simple line-by-line diff
            const maxLen = Math.max(originalLines.length, newLines.length);
            
            for (let i = 0; i < maxLen; i++) {
                const origLine = originalLines[i] || '';
                const newLine = newLines[i] || '';
                
                if (i >= originalLines.length) {
                    // Line added
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'add',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: '',
                        new: newLine
                    });
                } else if (i >= newLines.length) {
                    // Line removed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'remove',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: origLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: ''
                    });
                } else if (origLine !== newLine) {
                    // Line changed
                    changes.push({
                        type: 'change',
                        lineNum: i + 1,
                        content: newLine,
                        original: origLine,
                        new: newLine
                    });
                }
            }

            return changes;
        }

        function displayDiff(original, newText) {
            const originalCode = document.getElementById('originalCode');
            const newCode = document.getElementById('newCode');
            
            originalCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(original.split('\n'), 'original');
            newCode.innerHTML = highlightDiff(newText.split('\n'), 'new');
        }

        function highlightDiff(lines, type) {
            return lines.map((line, i) => {
                const change = changes.find(c => c.lineNum === i + 1);
                let cssClass = 'line-unchanged';
                
                if (change) {
                    if (type === 'original') {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-unchanged' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-removed' : 'line-removed';
                    } else {
                        cssClass = change.type === 'add' ? 'line-added' : 
                                  change.type === 'remove' ? 'line-unchanged' : 'line-added';
                    }
                }
                
                return `<div class="diff-line ${cssClass}">${escapeHtml(line || ' ')}</div>`;
            }).join('');
        }

        function displayChanges() {
            const changesList = document.getElementById('changesList');
            
            changesList.innerHTML = changes.map((change, index) => `
                <div class="change-item" id="change-${index}">
                    <div class="change-info">
                        <div class="change-line">
                            <strong>${change.type.toUpperCase()}</strong> Line ${change.lineNum}
                        </div>
                        <div class="change-preview">
                            ${change.type === 'add' ? '+ ' : change.type === 'remove' ? '- ' : '~ '}
                            ${escapeHtml(change.content.slice(0, 80))}${change.content.length > 80 ? '...' : ''}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="change-actions">
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-apply" onclick="applyChange(${index})">
                            Apply
                        </button>
                        <button class="btn btn-small btn-reject" onclick="rejectChange(${index})">
                            Skip
                        </button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');

            document.getElementById('applyAllBtn').onclick = applyAllChanges;
        }

        function displayStats() {
            const added = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'add').length;
            const removed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'remove').length;
            const changed = changes.filter(c => c.type === 'change').length;
            
            document.getElementById('linesAdded').textContent = added;
            document.getElementById('linesRemoved').textContent = removed;
            document.getElementById('linesChanged').textContent = changed;
            document.getElementById('totalChanges').textContent = changes.length;
        }

        function applyChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as applied
            change.applied = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.5';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`✅ Applied change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'success');
        }

        function rejectChange(index) {
            const change = changes[index];
            if (!change) return;
            
            // Mark change as rejected
            change.rejected = true;
            
            // Update UI
            const changeElement = document.getElementById(`change-${index}`);
            changeElement.style.opacity = '0.3';
            changeElement.style.background = 'rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.1)';
            
            showMessage(`❌ Skipped change at line ${change.lineNum}`, 'error');
        }

        function applyAllChanges() {
            let appliedCount = 0;
            
            changes.forEach((change, index) => {
                if (!change.applied && !change.rejected) {
                    applyChange(index);
                    appliedCount++;
                }
            });
            
            if (appliedCount > 0) {
                showMessage(`🎉 Applied ${appliedCount} changes! Ready to save to ${fileName}`, 'success');
                
                // Here you would implement the actual file saving logic
                // For now, we'll just show the updated content
                generateUpdatedDocument();
            } else {
                showMessage('ℹ️ No new changes to apply', 'error');
            }
        }

        function generateUpdatedDocument() {
            if (!detectedRange) return;
            
            const docStartLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.startMarker);
            const docEndLine = findMarkerInDocument(detectedRange.endMarker);
            
            // Apply changes to create updated document
            const appliedChanges = changes.filter(c => c.applied);
            let updatedSection = detectedRange.content;
            
            // Create updated document
            const updatedLines = [
                ...documentLines.slice(0, docStartLine + 1),
                ...updatedSection.split('\n'),
                ...documentLines.slice(docEndLine)
            ];
            
            const updatedDocument = updatedLines.join('\n');
            
            // Create download link
            const blob = new Blob([updatedDocument], { type: 'text/plain' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = url;
            a.download = fileName.replace(/\.([^.]+)$/, '-updated.$1');
            a.click();
            URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
        }

        function showMessage(message, type) {
            const className = type === 'success' ? 'success-message' : 'error-message';
            messageArea.innerHTML = `<div class="${className}">${message}</div>`;
            
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageArea.innerHTML = '';
            }, 5000);
        }

        function escapeHtml(text) {
            const div = document.createElement('div');
            div.textContent = text;
            return div.innerHTML;
        }
    </script>
</body>
</html>
